pages.text: $(bgreen)Three Peater$() likes reading, backgammon and long periods of immobility in the park. It enjoys going to shows, particularly modern jazz. Its favorite number is 5.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)300$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)three peas$() in three lanes every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)several peas in three lanes each tick$() which last several seconds, .
